com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiItemContainer<T extends AbstractItemStack>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiItemContainer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the item stack type stored within this item container, the type must derive from AbstractItemStack.

    public class GuiItemContainer<T extends AbstractItemStack>
extends GuiContainer
    This GUI node represents an item container that displays all the contained items in a grid of item slots.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GuiItemSlot<T> defaultSlot
      The default item slot, used as a template when rebuilding the containing item slots.
      protected T holding
      The item stack object that is currently held within this container.
      protected Vector2i nameplateOffset
      The offset from the mouse cursor that the nameplate will be located.
      protected ISlotLogic slotLogic
      The item slot logic used for all item slots within this item container.

      Returns the item slot the mouse cursor is hovering over, or null if cursor isn't over any item slot.

      Returns the item slots this item container contains.

      Returns the slot size of all item slots within this container.

    • Field Detail

      • holding

        protected final T extends AbstractItemStack holding
        The item stack object that is currently held within this container.

      • defaultSlot

        protected final GuiItemSlot<T extends AbstractItemStack> defaultSlot
        The default item slot, used as a template when rebuilding the containing item slots. If changes are made to this item slot call setItemSlotsDirty(), to rebuild item slots.

      • slotLogic

        protected ISlotLogic slotLogic
        The item slot logic used for all item slots within this item container.

      • nameplateOffset

        protected final Vector2i nameplateOffset
        The offset from the mouse cursor that the nameplate will be located.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiItemContainer

        public GuiItemContainer(AbstractScreen screen,
                        float localX,
                        float localY,
                        int slotSize,
                        int spacing,
                        T[][] items,
                        T holding)
        Create a new GuiItemContainer object.
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen that owns this node.
        localX - the local x position.
        localY - the local y position.
        slotSize - the size of each item slot.
        spacing - the spacing between each item slot.
        items - the items within the item slots.
        holding - the item stack object that is currently held within this container.

      • onGridChange

        protected void onGridChange(GuiItemSlot<T> slot,
                            boolean takeOnly)
        Called when the item slot grid changes.
        Parameters:
        slot - the item slot that changes
        takeOnly - true if the item slot logic was run on take only mode.

      • updateNameplate

        protected void updateNameplate()
        Updates the nameplate text and repositions it, if no slot is hovered the nameplate will be hidden.
